The Quranic researcher is the children of Israel.It is done by an intercession and they are not victorious to remind it of the children of Israel, and a return to warn them for the exaggeration in the advice, and for the permission that this is the same What is meant is from it, and it might be mastered in the expression, so the reaction came first with the vulgarity of the acceptance, advanced at the justice, and here is the word of the utility, and it is a good.It was said: Referring to the extent of the origin of the thing, and the abandonment of what is arranged on it, and the presenter was given a good delay, and the delay is the delay, and the delay is what is mentioned The matter of doing the right of precedent blessings, and what is here to remind the blessing of it, prefer them to the worlds, and it is the grace of faith in the Prophet, and the grace of their time To seek it and believe and be among the virtues, not the preferences, and to fear his followers about the horrors of resurrection and their fear, as they met with his followers.
